name: Chocolate Banana Bites
description: These vegan chocolate banana bites covered with crushed almonds, chia seeds, and coconut flakes are a healthy and refreshing snack in the summer!

recipeInstructions.text: Fill the bottom of a sauce pan with water and bring to a simmer. Place the chocolate in a heat-resistant bowl and put it into the sauce pan. Let the chocolate melt, stirring occasionally, until the chocolate is completely melted. To make the chocolate smoother, add some coconut milk. Alternatively, melt the chocolate in the microwave.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill the bottom of a sauce pan with water and bring to a simmer. Place the chocolate in a heat-resistant bowl and put it into the sauce pan. Let the chocolate melt, stirring occasionally, until the chocolate is completely melted. To make the chocolate smoother, add some coconut milk. Alternatively, melt the chocolate in the microwave.

recipeInstructions.text: While the chocolate is melting, cut the bananas into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: While the chocolate is melting, cut the bananas into bite-sized pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: With a small spoon, drizzle some of the melted chocolate on top of each banana and sprinkle the banana pieces immediately with the chopped almonds, coconut flakes and chia seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: With a small spoon, drizzle some of the melted chocolate on top of each banana and sprinkle the banana pieces immediately with the chopped almonds, coconut flakes and chia seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Stick a toothpick into each banana piece and put it into the freezer for about an hour. Let it thaw for about 5 minutes before serving.
